synopsis.text: High school newcomer Asunaro finds himself on the third-tier baseball team at Sakura High, a squad comprised of cast-offs and players lacking in skill. The baseball coach, viewing them as inferior, announces the team's disbandment within a month. However, one player pleads for a chance to prove their worth, leading to a high-stakes match against the school's top-ranked team. With guidance from Kaido, an ex-member of the elite squad, Asunaro and his teammates strive to defy expectations and secure their place in the prestigious Koshien Stadium. Can this underdog team rise to the challenge and demonstrate their true potential? Join Asunaro and his friends as they embark on a thrilling journey to prove their worth in the world of baseball.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
